publishedfiledetails.title: HG Stacking Mod 1000-50 V297
publishedfiledetails.description:
[h1][b]MOD DESCRIPTION[/b][/h1]
---------------------------------------------
[h1]Stacking mod increases +1000 (Ammo +250) and -50% weight reduction[/h1]
Items stack properly when you destroy structures.
Slingshot, fishing rod and Jerky works fine.
Vanilla Engrams works fine to mortar and pestle.

[h1]PLEASE READ THE INSTRUCTIONS[/h1]
Stacking mod needs to be as high as possible in the order of the mod list (GameUserSettings.ini). Craft resources (Sparkpowder, Cementingpaste etc.) will need to be relearnt, use a "Mindwipe Tonic". Crafting structures (Mortar, Fabricator etc.) will need to be rebuilt after installing this mod.
----------------------
Old resources (before install the mod) are not stacking, this is normal...

[H1]When this mod is removed by server, all resources made with it will also disappear. Same like all other mods, fair warning given.[/H1]

This mod is [u]not compatible[/u] with any other stacking mods!

[h1]If you like my mods, please thumb up and share the mod with your friends.[/h1]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/SyKt2xt.png[/img]
[h1]849372965[/h1]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/mN170h6.png[/img]
Mod works with TheIsland, TheCenter, Scorched Earth, Ragnarok, Aberration, Extinction and Valguero DLC.

[h1]Kibble stack to +500[/h1]

[h1]Standard Items +1000:[/h1]
Achatina Paste, Ammonite Bile, Angler Gel, Amarberry, Azulberry, Bio Toxin, Black Pearl, Bug Repellant, Charcoal, Chitin, Chitin Or Keratin, Chitin Paste, Cooked Meat, Cooked Meat Jerky, Cooked Prime Meat, Cooked Prime Meat, Jerky, Cooked Meat Fish, Cooked Prime Meat Fish, Cooked Lamp Chop, Crystal, Electronics, Element, Element Shard, Fiber, Flint, Gasoline, Gunpowder, Hide, Honey, Human Hair, Keratin, Leech Blood, Mejoberry, Metal, Metal Ingot, Narcoberry, Narcotic, Obsidan, Oil, Oil (Tusoteuthis), Pelt, Polymer, Polymer Organic, Rare Flower, Rare Mushroom, Raw Meat, Raw Prime Meat, Raw Meat Fish, Raw Prime Meat Fish, Raw Mutton, Sap, Seed Species X, Silicon, Stimberry, Stimulant, Stone, Sparkpowder, Spoiled Meat, Substrate Absorbent, Sweet Vegetable Cake, Thatch, Tintoberry, Veggie Citronal, Veggie Longrass, Veggie Rockarrot, Veggie Savoroot, Wood, Wool

[h1]Ammo +250:[/h1]
Adv. Bullet, Adv. Rifle Bullet, Adv. Sniper Bullet, Ballista Arrow, C4, Cannon ball (10), Grappling Hook, Metal Arrow, Pheromone Dart (50), Rocket, Shocking Tranquilizer Dart (50), Simple Bullet, Simple Rifle Bullet, Simple Shotgun Bullet, Stone Arrow, Tranq Arrow, Tranq Dart, Tranq Spear Bolt

[h1]Scorched Earth DLC Items +1000[/h1]
Cactus Sap, Clay, Preserving Salt, Propellant, Raw Salt, Sand, Silk, Sulfur, Wyvern Milk

[h1]Ammo +250:[/h1]
Flame Arrow, Flamethrower, Rocket Homing Missile

[h1]Aberration DLC Items +1000[/h1]
Blue Gem, Green Gem, Red Gem, Fungal Wood, Aggeravic Mushroom, Aquatic Mushroom, Ascerbic Mushroom, Auric Mushroom, Nameless Venom, Congealed Gas Ball, Element Ore, Reaper Pheremone

[h1]Extinction DLC Items +1000[/h1]
Blue Crystalized Sap, Condensed Gas, Congealed Gas Ball, Corrupted Nodule, Fragmented Green Gem, Fungal Wood, Red Crystalized Sap, Scrap Metal, Scrap Metal Ingot, Silicate

[h1]Convert Element to Travel:[/h1]
Player can convert Element to cross-travel-element in player inventory.
Servers that do not require this convert option can disable this option in the game.ini, please read the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/849372965/1639789306550071094/]Hide-Engram[/url] post.

To fix the "Sweet Veggie Cake" you can use my HG Cake Fix mod:
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1757776400][img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/790858329434944260/D087ADB0DAB8123131D92377E4D97E1017F1C642/?imw=268&imh=268&ima=fit&impolicy=Letterbox&imcolor=%23000000&letterbox=true[/img][/url]
